price: Basi zitawapotea khabari siku hiyo, nao hawataulizana.
arabic: فَعَمِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَهُمۡ لَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
footnotes: Khabari hizo zikawapita hawazitambui kama kwamba ni vipofu. Ikawa hapana amuulizae mwenziwe, kwani wote walikuwa sawa sawa wameshindwa kujibu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faʿamiyat ʿalayhimu al-anbāu yawma-idhin fahum lā yatasāalūna
